name: Resume
body:
# André Behrens

[Email me](mailto:andre.behrens@gmail.com)

## Experience

### The New York Times • November 2007 - Present

**Software Developer**
* Lead Developer: New York Times iGoogle Widget, Times Widgets, Times People iPhone Web App, New York Times Palm Pre Application, [New York Times Opinion Section Front](http://www.nytimes.com/opinion) (Front End), Prototype for New York Times iPad App
* Creator: [The New York Times Skimmer](http://www.nytimes.com/skimmer/)
* Led efforts to standardize and review front end code.

**Sr. Product Engineer**
* Continued development of Times Skimmer, which served as a vehicle for other initiatives.
* Consolidated effort for the site's Reading List feature, which in turn triggered an internal content API of high utility.

**Developer Advocate**
* Work on the team that handles internal and external events, outreach, APIs and documentation.
* Contributor to the [Open Blog](http://open.blogs.nytimes.com/author/andre-behrens/)

### Anteil • August 2003 - November 2007

**Programmer**
* Designed all user interfaces. Designed, authored and maintained AJAX generic save system. Designed supporting infrastructure and APIs for all user-facing tools in Java, PHP, and Ruby. Led adoption of library culture company-wide.


## Skills

### Web Development

* JavaScript, CoffeeScript
* HTML 5 and CSS 3

### Programming

* Node
* PHP
* Ruby
* Java
		
## Education

### Hampshire College, Amherst, MA

**Bachelor of the Arts**
**May 2002**			

Completed self-designed major combining computer science, education, and literature. Completed thesis project, "Evaluating and Enhancing the Efficacy of an Online Reading System". Built application, "BookExplorer."
